paper_abstract: A suitable way to decrease far-end crosstalks in microstrip interconnects is to increase the capacitive coupling between two adjacent strip lines. In this paper a method is proposed to optimal design of microstrip interconnects containing additional discrete coupling capacitors. A suitable error function along with some constrained conditions is defined to determine optimal values of both interconnect parameters and the additional coupling capacitors. The method is verified using a comprehensive example.
paper_title: Optimization of microstrip interconnects containing additional capacitive coupling using least mean square method
